mapper.select: SELECT * FROM painting ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT P.* FROM painting P JOIN painting_color_map PCM ON P.id = PCM.paintingId JOIN archiveColor AC ON PCM.archiveColorId = AC.id WHERE AC.colorName = #{colorName} ORDER BY PCM.score DESC
SELECT * FROM painting WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT paintingId FROM painting_color_map)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO painting_color_map ( paintingId, archiveColorId, raw_r, raw_g, raw_b, score, regDate ) VALUES ( #{paintingId}, #{archiveColorId}, #{raw_r}, #{raw_g}, #{raw_b}, #{score}, NOW() )
